name: "Santa Claus is Comin' the Town"
description:
It was a happy day for Junkland. Everyone was excited about Christmas. An idea came to Harry's mind, and he gathered junktoys that sounded like him, to the center of town. Together with Mary and Terry, they became a Christmas trio band. Almost everyone who heard the tones in the center of Junkland followed them with excitement. Together they sang, squeaking in their gears and rusty mechanical parts, forming a harmonic whole:

You better watch out, you better not cry
You better not pout, I'm telling you why
Santa Claus is comin' to town
